cont.entity_a: Rough adjustment release lock is under the collar lock and difficult to adjust. Fine adjustment sticks. Body does not slide smoothly in the collar. Smooth and easy to depth adjust. Prone to vertical adjustment issues due to dust accumulation. Retainer snap ring on vertical adjustment shaft has broken due to pressure. Depth locks in channels, with slight changes made via side dial. Base is very hard to adjust and the switch is unreliable. Adjustments are easy and precise. Router has easy depth adjustment and solid wrenches. Router is easy to adjust and change bits. Router is a favorite tool with easy adjustments.

Generally considered junk compared to other models. Generally higher quality than other brands. Great build quality and works flawlessly. Router is well made with plenty of power. Router is easy to control and has feel of quality. Router makes other routers look like junk. Router is durable and runs well without overheating. Router is well constructed and functional.

Powerful, quiet, and versatile. Router has plenty of power and soft start prevents jumping. Router is powerful and easy to control. Router is smooth, quiet, and powerful. Router is capable of producing 2.25 HP of mechanical energy. Router is well made with plenty of power. Router is powerful and offers good adjustment accuracy.

Soft start feature is softer than older models. Variable speed and soft start features are appreciated. Soft start and variable speed are beneficial features. Adjustable speed and accepts 1/4 and 1/2 inch shanks. Router has soft start and variable speed features.
cont.entity_b: Offers advanced features for VPN and remote access. Can be used as an end-node VPN. VPN feature is unreliable.

cont.entity_a: Easy to install and fits perfectly on the router table base. Requires a chuck extender for specific mounts.
cont.entity_b: Difficult to set up. VPN setup is not intuitive. Not suitable for beginners.

cont.entity_a: Speed controller failed after little use, but the part is inexpensive. Front spindle bearing is retained with screws, lacking a clamp. Box was previously opened and some parts were missing. Collet on the original router failed after about a year.
cont.entity_b: Router has consistent connectivity issues. Support does not respond to emails. Advertised as preferred for Boingo HotSpot, but service no longer offered. Parts were missing and box was broken upon delivery. Crashes frequently even with latest firmware. Poor wireless performance in mixed environments. G-Only mode does not work. Firmware updates have been problematic. Router requires frequent reboots.

cont.entity_a: Router performs well for occasional use. Router performs consistently over extended use. Router performs well in a router table setup.
Router requires assembly with many different bolts.

cont.entity_b: Router has consistent connectivity issues. Poor wireless performance in mixed environments. Router requires frequent reboots.
Firmware upgrade improved performance. Firmware updates have been problematic.
Router is easy to set up and configure. Not suitable for beginners.
